article: A lady once wrote a long story. She sent it to a famous editor. After  a few  weeks the editor  returned  the story to her. The lady was  _  . She wrote back to the editor: "Dear Sir, Yesterday you sent back a story of mine.  _  do you know that the story is not good? You did not read it.  _  I sent you the story, I pasted together pages 18; 19 and 20. This was a  _  to see whether you would read the story. When the story came back yesterday, the pages were  _  pasted together. Is this the  _  you read all the stories that are sent to you?" The editor wrote back: "Dear Madam, when I have an egg  _  breakfast, I  don't have to  eat the whole egg in order to discover that it is bad."
